description: This file is a FastAPI router module for streaming content, providing an endpoint to generate secure playback URLs for media content, with user authorization and subscription checks.

classes.name: StreamTokenOut
classes.description: Response schema that contains the secure playback URL and expiration information.

methods.name: str _append_query(url: str, params: dict)
methods.description: Helper function to append query parameters to a URL.

methods.name: get_stream_url(content_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API endpoint to generate a secure streaming URL for content, with subscription validation.

ctags.name: get_stream_url
ctags.pattern: /^def get_stream_url(content_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session /
ctags.signature: (content_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
